text: Can you help me modify a reminder for paying bills on March 20th at 12 PM?
Sure, I can help you with that. Can you confirm your username and password, please?
My username is admin and my password is adminpass.
Thank you. Now, please provide me the new content and time for the reminder.
The new content is "Pay utility bills" and the time is "2023-03-20 12:00:00".
Alright, the reminder has been updated successfully.
Can you also help me add an agenda?
Sure thing. Please provide me the details for the agenda, namely content, location, and time.
The agenda is "Meeting with project team", location is "Conference Room A", and time is "2023-03-25 10:00:00".
Agenda added successfully. Let me know if you need further assistance.
